name: [AR] Curling
description:
Ever played curling elsewhere than in an appropriate location for doing this? With «[AR] Curling» you have an entire rink right in your pocket. Play curling wherever you want. And for sure, you won’t get a cold.

With «[AR] Curling», you get the first augmented reality curling app, that really gives you a feeling of playing around with a curling-stone on a real sized rink, combined with a completely new gaming experience. Play curling with proper 3D movements. Really curly the stone.

Add a special target-screen to visually follow the stone and closely observe the target-area.

Use the settings menu. Here you find useful configuration options such as the sensitivity of the stone, the friction of the rink, the number of opposite stones or the direction of light. You can even scale the entire game, to fit in your home. All graphic 3D elements are of the highest quality.

As always, this game will be without in-app purchases or annoying ads to help you get a nice product.

We wish you a lot of fun with this AR title.
